sentences.en: Arsenal's AGM took place today. Here's what went on, with thanks to our intrepid reporter!
sentences.cn: 阿森纳在今天举行了年度会议. 在这里能得到最新消息, 多亏我们勇猛的报道员!

sentences.en: At this moment the three intrepid travellers appeared.
sentences.cn: 这时候,那三位勇敢的旅行家出现了.

sentences.en: Even the most intrepid World Cup fan will struggle to watch all 48 first - round matches.
sentences.cn: 即使是世界杯最铁杆的球迷,要将首轮48场比赛一气看完,绝对是费心劳神的事.

sentences.en: He has an intrepid disposition, and great strength.
sentences.cn: 他生性悍勇, 力大过人.

sentences.en: He is intrepid and lives up to the name of a fearless hero.
sentences.cn: 他果然名不虚传,是一位一身是胆的英雄.

sentences.en: His intrepid adversary prepared to close for the thirteenth time.
sentences.cn: 他那勇敢的对手准备打第十三回合.

sentences.en: John's intrepid personality made him a good choice for team leader.
sentences.cn: 约翰勇敢的个性适合作领导工作.

sentences.en: Lately, though , an intrepid band of researchers has been trying to remedy that.
sentences.cn: 而近来一些坚韧不拔的研究者一直试图在修正那种探索.

sentences.en: No intrepid picture be not a droplet like me!
sentences.cn: 不强悍的图俺一般是不发滴!

sentences.en: Some intrepid individuals were still prepared to make the journey.
sentences.cn: 某些无畏的人仍然准备作此旅行.

sentences.en: The " Intrepid " was used by Lowe for aerial surveillance during the Civil War.
sentences.cn: 在内战期间,洛曾把 “ 无畏者 ” 号气球用于空中监视方面.

sentences.en: The commander and his officers took an affectionate farewell of their intrepid friends.
sentences.cn: 舰长和军官们热烈拥抱他们的勇敢的朋友们.

sentences.en: The unfortunate youth was intrepid in the attack, and rude in the defence.
sentences.cn: 那不幸的年轻人勇于进攻, 防守时也厉害.

sentences.en: They moved in their own singular formation graceful, intrepid, and free.
sentences.cn: 它们以自己独有的陈式移动着,优雅, 无畏, 自在.

sentences.en: Was he too intrepid or just as good at skiing as other sports?
sentences.cn: 是他太猛,还是他滑雪的技术不如其它运动?

trans.tran_cn: 无畏的，勇敢的，刚毅的，勇猛的
trans.tran_en: willing to do dangerous things or go to dangerous places – often used humorously
